title: Classic
transcript:
[[A guy is sitting in front of a television, viewing some rock performance or other.]]
Song: And as we wind on down the road, our shadows taller than our soul
Song: When all is one and one is all, to be a rock and not to rooooll
Song [[fading away]]: And she's buying a stairway to Heaven
Guy: Man. The Baby Boomers are kicking our _ASSES_.
Guy [[continueing]]: We need to get it together, guys.
{{title-text: Someone get that Pachelbel's Canon kid a recording contract, stat.}}
{{The song lyrics is of Stairway to Heavens by Led Zeppelin}}
alt: Someone get that Pachelbel's Canon kid a recording contract, stat.
